front.title: Considerations for Benchmarking Virtual Network Functions and Their Infrastructure

abstract.t: Benchmarking Methodology Working Group has traditionally conducted laboratory characterization of dedicated physical implementations of internetworking functions. This memo investigates additional considerations when network functions are virtualized and performed in commodity off-the-shelf hardware. Version NOTES: Addressed Barry Constantine's comments throughout the draft, see: http://www.ietf.org/mail-archive/web/bmwg/current/msg03167.html AND, comments from the extended discussion during IETF-92 BMWG session:
